entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory not being collected back #80351
  • Implementation of a static virtual method in a derived type is not found when there is a re-abstraction of the same method higher in inheritance hierarchy #80350
  • String concatenation - slight performance regression in .NET 7 (7.0.1) compared to .NET 6 #80348
  • [API Proposal]: `IByteConvertible<TSelf>` #80345
  • A potential bug in FileStream (async + buffer)? #80344
  • Crash when running a csc compiled program in mono VM #80342
  • [API Proposal]: Mergeable dictionary (mutable and persistent) #80339
  • NativeAOT publish for DLL does not set automatically RID #80338
  • [API Proposal]: Add Int128 and UInt128 `BitConverter.GetBytes` support #80337
  • WebApplicationBuilder ILoggingBuilder does not enable logging by default #80336
    Future

Closed

  • Required Members doesn't work on .NET 6.0 #80346
  • The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect - When a docker container is set to automatically restart or manually restarted #79707
  • [API Proposal]: tweak IndexOfAnyValues<T> public API surface to drop dead paths #80340
  • Optimize BigInteger "DataTip" speed #17453
    Future
  • Binary DataContractSerializer serialization is broken in .NET 7 for floating point data types #78913
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a debug only config knob to control the maximum force inline depth #80349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues for shorter set repeaters #80341
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] amend the ABI for the tests: #80326
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [NativeAOT] clone the QueueUserAPC2 related definitions to not require 22621 Windows sdk #80333
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark Task.IsFaulted as ensuring that Task.Exception is non-null #80278
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Clarify INumber.IsPositive and INumber.IsNegative documentation #80026
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix nullable annotations in ITypedList #80033
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80274
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival > 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2082512 #80322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
